Posts.Content: On 1/29/2009 chrishoida wrote: I was diagnosed in nov 08 i just started chemo 2 weeks ago and it is  starting to hit me now my hair is falling out in clumps and it is scaring me i am the first in my family to get breast cancer and i am still young i am only 45 years old My wife (Ok, ex wife but still my best friend) was just diagnosed with Stage 4 Squamous cell cancer (skin cancer). She's 44 and always ate right and exercised. It isn't fair (I know...no one ever said life was fair). She hasn't started chemo yet but will be starting it in the next few days. We're scared too. All you can do is fight. I hope your family/friends are helping. My son and I are trying to help keep Sandy's morale up but the whole thing is so awful. My thoughts are with you. You are not alone and every day I think we get closer to curing the horrible C.   Scott
Posts.Title: scared
